nodes.text: Rigo was a bounty hunter who lived at the time of the Clone Wars. During the conflict between the Republic and the Separatists, he and a gang of bounty hunters attacked Obi-Wan Kenobi and the Advanced Recon Commando Alpha-17, which had previously landed on Riflor. Rigo and his gang lured the two into a dead end and convert them. Shortly after Anakin Skywalker and Ki-Adi-Mundi arrived to rescue Obi-Wan, in which they managed to overwhelm the gang and Rigo was killed in the fight.
